Name: bisphenol A production, powder | bisphenol A, powder | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: Production by catalysed condensation of phenol and acetone with a yield of 98%. The inventory is based on stoechiometric calculations from the following equation: 2C6H6O + C3H6O -> C15H16O2 + H2O.The emissions to air (0.2 wt% of raw material input) and water were estimated using mass balance. Treatment of the waste water in an internal waste water treatment plant is assumed.;References:;Hischier R. (2007) Life Cycle Inventories of Packagings & Graphical Papers. ecoinvent report No. 11.
